name: First Stop Health
description: An online and on-call health concierge
overview:
First Stop Health is an integrated, patient-centric healthcare experience. We deliver fast, convenient access to the information and healthcare professionals you need to get from a medical issue to a healthcare solution.

Our mission is to make interacting with the American health care system more convenient, more efficient, and more cost effective for everyday people.

We combine instant 24/7 telephonic access to a physician, patient advocacy services, health information and news about your conditions and concerns, and tools to locate the health resources you need in your area. Whether the issue is major or minor, chronic or urgent, First Stop Health delivers resources to its members to address their health care issues.

First Stop Health is the advisory layer between patients and an often unavailable and frequently confusing health care system. Not sure what to do when your daughter develops a rash and a 102 degree fever at 10 pm on a Saturday evening? Do you need to help find treatment options for a loved one who has just been diagnosed with a serious disease? Or, maybe you just want to find a highly qualified dermatologist in your area.

First Stop Health combines information and human guides on a single web/voice platform, to deliver health solutions in a uniquely convenient and efficient way. Our members come to First Stop Health with a problem and leave with a solution appropriate for their condition and geographic location.

First Stop Health operates on a “freemium” business model providing access to health care resources at both free and subscription levels.
